enrollment.title: Online Enrollment Process For New Students

step.title: Create an Online Account
step.description: Register on the school's enrollment portal

step.title: Fill Out the Enrollment Form Online
step.description: Complete and submit the digital enrollment form

step.title: Upload Required Documents
step.description: Scan and upload all necessary documents

step.title: Pay Enrollment Fee
step.description: Pay online or visit the school to pay in cash

step.title: Receive Confirmation and Account Setup
step.description: Wait for email confirmation and system login credentials
